ReviewSection.pcMag: "Internxt is on mega-sale, has **excellent user reviews**, end-to-end and **post-quantum encryption**, and make their code completely **open source**."
ReviewSection.mashable: "Get **serious** about **securing** your **important data** with Internxt. They make **privacy their top concern,** so you can rest easy knowing your files are **safe**."
ReviewSection.pcWorld: "Internxt's web access, file sync, and backup services are **impressive**. This **encrypted online storage** service is **easy,** and the current plans are a steal."

TrustedBySection.title: Trusted by people like you
TrustedBySection.review: I keep my information secure online thanks to Internxt. Their customer support is fast, and their services are incredibly reliable. The fact that they are audited, open-source and encrypted makes me rest assured that my data is always protected from third-parties.
TrustedBySection.author: Sandra Díaz - Trustpilot Review

NextGenSection.title: Why choose Internxt?
NextGenSection.description: Internxt puts you back in control of your privacy. Unlike traditional cloud storage, we ensure only you have the keys to your encrypted data and we don’t store or sell your data to third parties. We take every step to ensure your information remains secure.

descriptions: We don't store passwords or user data and all of your data is encrypted in-transit and at-rest. Internxt puts you in full control of your files. Your data is your business. Protecting it is ours.
Internxt is the only cloud storage that automatically encrypts your files using end-to-end and post-quantum cryptography, meaning only you can access your data.
We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub and can be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have nothing to hide but your data.
We're wholly GDPR compliant and 100% safe, but don't take our word for it. Internxt has been independently audited and verified by Europe's leading penetration testing company, Securitum.

FeaturesSection.title: Why choose Internxt?
FeaturesSection.description: Privacy made for everyone and simple-to-use online security that you don’t have to be an expert to understand. Powerful but familiar, Internxt is encrypted cloud storage built for everyday use in all walks of life.

PartnershipSection.description2: Startpage shares any of he same values with Internxt and we couldn't be happier to collaborate with a search engine that helps you protect your personal data, hide from trackers, and browse entirely anonymously.

adv.title: Sync files and photos on any device

Access to all our services: 
Drive, Photos, and Send

DealSection.footer: Deal is valid only for new subscribers or free plan users.

faq.question: How can I get the Startpage deal discount?
answer: To take advantage of our Startpage discount, you must click one of the “Claim the deal” buttons located on this page, and you will be redirected directly to checkout with the discount already applied to your new 2TB Internxt plan. Or, simply, use the code STARTPAGE at checkout.

faq.question: When does the promotion end?
answer: Our Startpage deal runs from February 20th until March 6th, 2023.

faq.question: Who is eligible for this discount?
answer: New users or anyone with an Internxt free, 20GB, or 200GB subscription plan is eligible to take part in our Startpage deal.

faq.question: Will I keep the discount when my plan ends?
answer: The discount is only applied for the first 30 days of the first full year of service. If you choose to continue your subscription after using the deal, your account will be charged at the standard 2TB plan price for the following months or year.

faq.question: How much will the plan cost after the first month?
answer: After the first 30 days free, the 2TB plan costs €9.99/month paid monthly or €8.99/month when paid annually. You can check out all our [pricing and subscription plans](https://internxt.com/pricing) on the Internxt website.

faq.question: What payment methods does Internxt accept?
answer: We currently accept payments via credit and debit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc.). You may also pay via Apple and Google Pay, Cartes Banaires, Alipay, Wechat Pay, Bancontact, EPS, GiroPay, iDEAL, Przelewy24, Sofort, Blik, Klarna, Afterpay, SEPA Direct Debit.

faq.question: Have more questions?
answer: If you have more questions, feel free to reach out to us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com) or say hello on social media. We are always delighted to hear from you!
